content: I'm trying to move definitions of all order classes to a dedicated file (I want the definitions to be available before all the theory), and moving code around leads to a strange build error, see https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/runs/778969750
Even with pp.all true I can't understand why it fails to unify two expressions.
I don't understand what happens, and can't make an #mwe.
